# sse_destination_list (Resource)

Destination List resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "sse_destination_list" "example" {
  name           = "Terraform Destination List"
  access         = "allow"
  is_global      = false
  bundle_type_id = 1
  destinations = [
    {
      destination = "example.com"
      type        = "domain"
      comment     = "Example Domain"
    },
    {
      destination = "1.1.1.1"
      type        = "ipv4"
      comment     = "Example IP"
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

### Required

- `access` (String)
- `bundle_type_id` (Number)
- `is_global` (Boolean)
- `name` (String)

### Optional

- `destinations` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--destinations))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Destination List ID

- `destination` (String)
- `type` (String)
